name: paynless-framework-monorepo
description: Monorepo for the Paynless framework backend, shared packages, and apps.

scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:buildinfo
scripts.clean:dist: rimraf packages/types/dist packages/utils/dist packages/api-client/dist packages/store/dist packages/ui-components/dist apps/web/dist
scripts.clean:buildinfo: rimraf packages/types/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/utils/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/api-client/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/store/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/ui-components/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo apps/web/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.test: echo "Error: no root test specified" && exit 1
